text: Thiruvanchoor Radhakrishnan (Malayalam:തിരുവഞ്ചൂര്‍ രാധാകൃഷ്ണന്‍ ) (born 26 December 1949) is an Indian politician. From 13 April 2012 to 1 January 2014 he was the Home Minister in Oommen Chandy Ministry, Government of Kerala. He was holding the Vigilance Portfolio, handed over from the current Chief Minister Oommen Chandy. He was handed over the charges of Home Ministry to Ramesh Chennithala from 1 January 2014 and taken the Forest, Transport, Sports, Cinema & Environment portfolios.
